data.name: Money by Afterpay Daily Account
data.description: The Money by Afterpay Daily Account is an account for everyday payments, transfers and purchases.  With no set-up or ongoing fees.

features.additionalInfo: You can access your accounts through Money on your mobile for all your online banking.
Make an unlimited number of transfers and payments from your Money daily account.
Make transfers and send payments in real time.
All statements, notifications and other communications will be delivered electronically over email, text message and in-app notifications
You will be issued with a debit card to access your Money daily account.
Add your card to your digital wallet through Apple Pay.
Roundups round up your Debit card transactions to the nearest dollar and transfers that amount to your nominated savings account.
You cannot make or receive international money transfers from your Money daily account.

constraints.additionalInfo: Daily transaction limit apply to payments from your account.
Daily ATM and cash out withdrawal limit

eligibility.additionalInfo: We can’t open accounts in joint names, with multiple signatories, or under a Power of Attorney.  The product is currently not available to organisations.
You must be an Australian resident who is at least 18 years old.
You must have an Australian mobile number and a valid email address.
You must have an Afterpay BNPL account.
To open an account, you will need to download, register and activate your Money by Afterpay app.

fees.name: Non-Westpac ATM Withdrawal fee
fees.additionalValue: Non-Westpac, St.George, BankSA, Bank of Melbourne ATMs within Australia cash withdrawal or balance enquiry - however the ATM owner may apply an ATM operator fee.

fees.name: Overseas ATM cash withdrawal from a Global ATM Alliance partner
